snippet: The former Morgan Stanley analyst said at the AllThingsD conference on Wednesday that a string of technical glitches should take most of the blame for Facebook's dismal first day of trading.
abstract: The former Morgan Stanley analyst said at the AllThingsD conference on Wednesday that a string of technical glitches should take most of the blame for Facebook's dismal first day of trading.

headline.main: Technical Trading Issues to Blame for Facebook's Fall, Meeker Says
